Muropeptide

Muropeptide = Monomer , { Connection , Monomer } , [ { " " }- , Crosslinks ] ;

Muropeptide is referencing:

  • Monomer
  • Connection
  • Crosslinks

Monomer

Monomer = Glycan , "-" , Peptide | Peptide | Glycan ;

Items referencing Monomer:

  • Muropeptide

Monomer is referencing:

  • Glycan
  • Peptide

Connection

Connection = "=" (* Crosslink *) | "~" (* Glycosidic Bond *) ;

Items referencing Connection:

  • Muropeptide

Modifications

Modifications = "(" , Named Modification | Offset Modification , { { " " } , "," , { " " } , Named Modification | Offset Modification } , ")" ;

Items referencing Modifications:

  • Glycan
  • Peptide
  • Lateral Chain

  • Named Modification
